changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "invoice" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "status" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, "currency" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "total_cents" INT NOT NULL, "tax_cents" INT NOT NULL, "discount_cents" INT NOT NULL, "due_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "paid_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "stripe_invoice_key" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "subscription_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("subscription_id") REFERENCES "subscription" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("stripe_invoice_key") ); CREATE INDEX "idx_invoice_subscription_id" ON "invoice" ("subscription_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_invoice_due_at_active" ON "invoice" ("due_at") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "due_at" IS NOT NULL;
